label: 島津久光
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
説明文: (1817-87). Also: Saburo. Half-brother to Shimazu Nariakira; father of Tadayoshi, Nariakira's successor as daimyo of Satsuma; as such, effective head of domain in 1860's. Leader of kobu-gattai party; patron of Okubo Toshimichi and Saigo Takamori. After 1868, a conservative opponent of Meiji reform program.
